"Beg for your life. I dont really care if you do. Prepare to be wasted."
Megatron informed Perceptor, as he aimed his Fusion cannon at Perceptor.
He may destroy the CR chamber Perceptor was in, but while in it, he knew
there was little chance of the Predacon dodging it. Beastbox saw this
and instinctivly jumped out of the way.
